releases.content:
Remix of the Proto-barrel by Proto to facilitate shooting arrows from, but not limited to the following platforms:

- CMMG Dedicated or Conversion .22LR AR (think AWCY? Tubee or AWCY? scARpion)
- Ruger 10/22 Fixed/Standard Barrel (Ruger 10-22, LX-22, Mussy G22v3, Fixed Barrel Galileo)
- Ruger 10/22 Takedown (AWCY? Bento Box, Ruger OEM Takedown, Galileo Takedown

data.description: A barrel system for shooting crossbow bolts propelled by .22 construction nail gun loads

releases.content:
Known compatible Aimpoint footprint optics: - Aimpoint Micro H-1 - Aimpoint Micro H-2 - Aimpoint Micro T-1 - Aimpoint Micro T-2 - Burris Fastfire RD - Primary Arms Micro Dots - MAKdot S 1×20 - Blaser RD 17 - Vortex Crossfire - Vortex Sparc AR - Vortex Sparc Solar - Minox RV1 - Holosun Paralow 403 models (except the ‘A‘ model) - Holosun Paralow 503 models - Holosun Paralow 515 models - Holosun 530 models (Infiniti) - Sig Sauer Romeo4 - Sig Sauer Romeo5 - DI Optical SP1 - Athlon Midas TSR2 - Actus Core-1 1×20 - Actus Core-2 1×20 - Sightmark Wolverine - Swampfox Liberator 1×22 - Vector Optics Maverick 1×22

Known compatible Pinty optics: - Pinty Pro 1x22mm

Other optics may be compatible with the same bolt pattern - Tested with .22lr, 9mm, 7.62x39, & 12 gauge

data.description: A 2" picatinny riser compatible with Aimpoint Micro and Pinty optics

features.Printable Parts: Main body (4 Versions), Rear sight, Windage nut
features.Print Settings: PLA+ or stronger, 205-230° C, 100% infill, No supports needed

data.description: Standard and large 9mm and 10mm Glock magazines.

releases.content: Please be careful with what you're sending out of this bad boy upper...

data.description: The can cannon inspired 37mm signaling device designed for use with any standard AR-15 Lower
A versatile gun mount allowing for easy slide racking.
Pistol caliber alien tech at the forefront of discovery.
Look good while you are driving in and out pins

releases.content:
This is an accessory pack. You will need to download the original ScARpion release to use as the base.

This package also contains:

1. A picatinny backplate allowing the use of stocks and braces that utilize a picatinny attachment.
2. An updated lower receiver allowing for use of grips with an extended beavertail.

data.description: A furniture package to let your ScARpion 22 roleplay as a SL8!
